short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select text, right-click, and Microsoft's Immersive Reader will help you read it

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
After you install this [UNOFFICIAL!] extension, you'll be able to select text and right-click it to use Microsoft's Immersive Reader with it!

This extension is not published or endorsed by Microsoft in any way, and it's not supported by any company. But I'll keep it going for free as long as its useful!
